name: xavier heights
description:
this is a very personal short gameboy color game i made during sleepless nights and made with lots of love.

this my very first attempt at using gb studio so apologies in advance if you notice any bugs within the game.

p.s. i tried my best to provide the necessary cues in there so you can play it in its full glory. so make sure to read the dialogues thoroughly & interact with as much objects as you can, because you never know—you might come across something you didn't expect ;D

controls:

(for desktop)

arrow keys or wsad - move

z - interact

enter - start

---

(for mobile)

arrow keys - move

a - interact

start - start. obviously.

and that's it.  have fun~
